text: [Music]
once upon a time

and lived a happy

there was a forest where only animals
lived
and no humans ever entered

each other
all the animals lived in peace
they all had different characteristics
for example the monkey was the naughty
one
the chipmunk was the wuss the lion
was to brave the gazelle was the fast
the turtle was the slow the fox was the
cheeky one
and the bees were the hard-working ones
the only one that no animal in the
forest could get along with
was the arrogant crow
the crow did not like to share his food
[Music]
sometimes he even stole food from the
other animals
and flew away all the animals were
talking about this selfish crow
and that he needed to be taught a lesson
being the cheekiest and the smartest one
the fox made the first comment you guys
leave it up to me
i will do such a trick on that selfish
crow he won't be able to be an arrogant
snob anymore
one day the crow went into the city to
look for food
and he returned to the forest with a big

[Music]
and rested on a branch
watching from afar the fox decided to

next to the tree on which the crew was
resting
at that moment the crow was picking on
the cheese that he put
on the branch hi there my friend what is

i've never seen something like that
they call it cheese the humans eat this
hmm i'm curious about it stace would you

no way do you know how far you had to

so what one day i will share my food
with you and will be even
and why would i care about your filthy

this cheese is very special you can find

whatever he said the fox could not

the fox was smart but the crow was just

so this time the fox made another plan
okay okay have your cheese i don't want

that you don't want to share
when the fox started to grab the tree
the crow took the cheese
in a panic and flew to another branch
this time the fox went under the other
tree
where the crow was but the crew had no

the fox gave it a little thought and
came up with another plan
what are the most important flaws of the

maybe i should take advantage of these
to get that food from him
hey my friend do you know why i really
came down here
to prevent losing the cheese in his
mouth he asked without
opening up his beak what
i have heard that you have the most

and apparently when you're seeing all

when the crow heard this he fluffed his

very sure of himself
sing me a song so that i can hear the

[Music]
the crow was stunned motionless
[Music]
oh look at this now your precious cheese

and man it tastes good due to his

my friend what did we learn you should
not think of yourself much bigger than
you
actually are you shouldn't believe

you shouldn't go around saying i'm the

the fox walked away and was now lost in

he always had good relations with all

once upon a time in a little cottage in
the woods
lived a mother goat and her little goats
leading a happy life
the little goats were very cute they all
were like toys
mother goat like all mothers loved her
little goats
very much she protected them from all
the wild animals in the forest
one day before she left the house to
find food in the forest
she called her little goats next to her
and
my dear children i am going into the
forest do not open the door for anyone
if the wolf comes into the house he will
eat all of us alive he's very shifty
he will disguise himself into different
shapes and try to fool you
so how will we recognize him the wolf
has a rough voice and i have a soft and
sweet voice
so you can recognize him from his low
and rough voice right away
right when she was leaving the mother
goat remembered something else
she turned to her little goats one more
thing the wolf's feet are black and mine
are white
you can also recognize him from his feet
don't worry mother we can protect
ourselves
you can count on us mother goat kissed
her little goats
one by one and headed into the woods
the wolf was watching them from afar
when he saw mother goat leaving
he waited a while and then he came in
front of the cottage
and knocked on the door
[Music]
who is it little goats open the door
your mother is here i brought nice food
for you all
but the little goats recognized the
wolf's rough voice right away
without opening the door they yelled out
you're not
our mother her voice is sweet and more
beautiful
you're the wolf you can't fool us
the wolf got very angry because he could
not fool the little goats
so he went to the shop bought a big
piece of chalk and ate it
now his voice sounded much softer so he
went back to the cottage
and knocked on the door again
[Music]
this time the wolf started to talk with
his soft voice
my little goats open the door it's your
mother i brought food from the forest
for all of you
hearing the wolves soft voice the little
goats thought that it was really their
mother this time
just when they were about to open the
door one of them shouted
wait wait yes look at the feet from
underneath the door
of course when the little goats looked

wolf's black feet
so they yelled again without opening the
door we will not
open the door for you i'm on his feet
and not black
they're right you're the wolf as fairies
as he was
the wolf left this time he went to the
bakery
when the baker saw the wolf in front of
him he was very surprised
i'm a vegetarian now so i will eat
pastry from now on could you give me
some flour
the wolf came out of the bakery with a
little sack of flour
when he got near the cottage he
opened the sack and poured all the flour
on his feet
now his feet were all white the shifty
wolf
knocked on the door for the third time
my little goats open the door it's your
mother
i have brought food for all of you from
the forest
first show us your feet so we know it's
you mother
the wolf showed them his feet with
flower when the little goat saw the wide
feet
they believed that it was their mother
and opened the door
and what did they see
the wolf was standing right there in
front of them
the little goats did not know what to do
they started to run around
[Applause]
[Music]
waste your yelling i will catch all of

come here don't run i will catch you all
i said stop

he was already full so he gave up on

oh my little goats

they saw the wolf sleeping under a tree
he snored so bad that the branches of

mother goat observed the wolf for a

she realized that inside his tummy some

oh my god can it be that my goats are in

she had a plan she turned to her kid
run home bring me a needle thread and

when the little kid was running home

ah my little goats you're safe

he did not move mother goat and her

when the wolf woke up he stood up his

hurt really bad he thought to himself

because his tummy was full of rocks he

he came next to the river to drink some

my tummy feels so heavy and full
it's as if all the girls i ate turned

he wanted to kneel down and drink some

due to the rocks being so heavy he lost

and slipped into the water oh
help help me i'm drowning
help

he could not bear the weight of the

ran to the river

in a forest lived a rather rickety mouse
he was so afraid of the fox the wolf

how scared is he you're even scared of

you're so scared you're so scared

the lion the lion had just finished

on a little farm lived a cute
duck family mummy duck was sitting on

one sunny morning the eggs began

with great joy the six little ducklings

the ducklings were trying to adapt to

they were cracking and walking around
mother duck
however the largest egg of them all were
still
trying to hatch and mother duck began to
worry
she thought that there might be
something wrong she decided to wait
a little while longer and at last
the seventh and the largest egg hatched
with great confusion the poor ducklings

little did he know his mother and
